ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of LORNE J. MACDOWELL of St.George’s Channel, in the Province of Nova Scotia, one of Her Majesty’s Counsel learned in the law, to be a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.
